ShortDescription.Value: No Pollution will stop/remove all pollution from the map

Publish.LongDescription:
# No Pollution Mod
This mod will stop pollution from being produced on the map and remove existing pollution.
## Functionality
This mod will: - Stop noise pollution - Stop ground pollution - Stop air pollution - Stop groundwater pollution - Let you control the water pollution decay rate with a slider
## Whats New:
## Roadmap - Pollution Master slider - Dynamic pollution for ground, air, and noise pollutions.
